title: Create download link in the app

requirements.text: Update the Android download button in the app footer (Layout.tsx) to link to an actual download URL instead of the placeholder '#android-download'
acceptanceCriteria: The Android download button in the footer navigates to a valid URL when clicked
The link can point to either a Play Store URL or a direct APK download location
The button remains visually consistent with the existing footer design

constraints: Do not modify the footer layout or CEO attribution
Preserve the existing button styling and icon
nonGoals: Creating an actual Android build or APK file
Adding additional download options for other platforms
